Submodules¶

textarena.game_makers.gpt_judges module¶

class textarena.game_makers.gpt_judges.GPTGamemaster(model_name: str, temperature: float = 0.7, max_tokens: int = 10)[source]¶

Bases: GameMaker

GPTGamemaster interfaces with OpenAI’s language models to generate responses based on player input.

class textarena.game_makers.gpt_judges.GPTGamemasterAction(options: List[str], model_name: str = 'gpt-4o-mini', temperature: float = 0.7, max_tokens: int = 10)[source]¶

Bases: GameMasterAction

GPTGamemasterAction manages a GPTGamemaster instance to simulate a gamemaster’s responses in games.

class textarena.game_makers.gpt_judges.GPTJudge(model_name: str, temperature: float = 0.7)[source]¶

Bases: GameMaker

GPTJudge is responsible for interfacing with OpenAI’s language models to generate judgments based on input text.

It utilizes a specified GPT model to evaluate the given input and return a judgment or decision.

class textarena.game_makers.gpt_judges.GPTJudgeVote(options: List[str], num_judges: int = 5, model_names: List[str] | None = None, temperature: float = 0.7)[source]¶

Bases: JudgeVote

GPTJudgeVote manages a collection of GPTJudge instances to simulate multiple judges voting on options.

It initializes a specified number of judges with randomly selected models and facilitates the voting process.

evaluate(context: str) → Dict[str, int][source]¶

Evaluate the given context by having each judge cast a vote among the provided options.

Parameters:

context (str) – The context or scenario to evaluate.

Returns:

A dictionary mapping each option to the number of votes it received.

Return type:

Dict[str, int]
